posts.title: Mt. Adams
posts.content: My first summit on a glaciated peak was on Mt. Adams. This challenged me. It was cold and windy, but the feeling was incredible. I'd never been so high.

posts.title: Unicorn, Castle-Pinnacle Traverse
posts.content: My first technical summit was Unicorn Peak in the Tatoosh Range. The following day we scrambled up Castle and Pinnacle. There was lightning and a killer view of Mt. Ranier.
posts.song: Apply Some Pressure by Mark Ronson

posts.title: Mt. Hood
posts.content: The night was clear, and Casseiopia framed the moonlit summit of Mt. Hood. Sun rose when we reached the Hogsback at about 9000ft. The summit cast a shadow on the atmosphere itself, its dark pink triangle tip bowing up over a sea of clouds at 7000ft.
posts.partners: Jay, Etta, Marshall, etc. A big group.
posts.song: Build Me Up Buttercup by The Temptations
